version_description:
Changed
* reset guide button UI

Fixes
* visibility issue when there are important upgrades
* reset issue when the device name has been changed
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

Changes
* Location authorization UI
* Settings UI

Fixes
* Condition settings UI
* Incorrect display of UI after initial setup
* Keyboard blocking the screen when need of outgoing text input
* UI issues when the length of TVOC number is long
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* Push repeat operation(firmware update required)
* Alert sensitivity configuration of movement(firmware update required)
* Delete option for hub no longer in use

Changes
* Alarm when going back to previous page after Magiclink has been sent
* MicroBot scanning UI

Fixes
* Push Timer not being updated issue
* Unpairing issues of MicroBots
* White screen issues
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* Display of registered email on the sidebar

Fixes
* UI issue of Push repeat settings
* Firmware update issues
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs
* Configuration settings of MicroBot initialization changes

New
* New retry feature on sidebar if data is not imported correctly

Changes
* First time authentication UI

Fixes
* Error when entering blank when setting repeat function
* Error when measurement cycle time is set to 5 seconds or less
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* New UI for adding hubs

Fixed
* Fixed hub displaying offline when hub is actually online
* Fixed unpairing multiple MicroBots
* Fixed Magic Link description
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* New UI for Alert notification sound selection

Fixes
* Device name issue when pairing Push 2G
* UI issue for repeat funtion of Push
* UI issue of Alert when typing outgoing URL
* Deactivated data display issue when sharing Alert data

New
* Improvement on responsiveness when MicroBot is connected via direct mode with smartphone

Changes
* UI change on not displaying On/Off when repeat feature has been activated.

Fixes
* Device online or offline status display issue
* Notification wording when more than 5 timer have been activated.
* UI animation issue of Push
* Alert device name not displaying in the push notification when the configured condition has been met.
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* Configuring Tags on MicroBot

Changes
* Configuring the name and profile image when adding a new MicroBot.
* Guide notification of how to change the name of a MicroBot if it is in its default name.
* Quick guide and support page.

Fixes
* Precision update on the MicroBot status.
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* Instructions for adding Gen1 Push
* Notification when MicroBot scanning is performed with Bluetooth disabled

Fixes
* Issues that may occur when trying to add a MicroBot that has been registered and reset
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

Fixes
* Issues with outgoing webhook test
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* Tag configuration or changes in Settings

Fixes
* App crash when configuring repeat feature
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

New
* Hub M connection stability

Fixes
* Miscellaneous UI and minor bugs

Fixes
* Japanese does not appear.
* Minor bugs and UI.
